rows.name: text_top_1
rows.value: Compensation for subtraction means adding or subtracting the same amount for both numbers to maintain their distance. Use compensation on 13 - 8 by adding 2 to both numbers to turn the problem into 15 - 10. Single-digit problems can also be done this way. For example, 3 can be added to both numbers in 7 - 3 to make it 10 - 6.
